attribute-definition.description: Employee ID of Store Associate, if the basket was created in the store.
This field contains the store ID used for for clients to attribute sales to a specific store.
Employee ID of Store Associate, if the order was created in the store
This field contains the store ID used for for clients to attribute sales to a specific store.
Store Associate's (Agent) Employee ID
Store Manager's Employee ID
This field contains the store ID used for for clients to attribute sales to a specific store.
Links the store to the productlineitem for grouping shipments in the checkout process.
Used to map the shipment to a brick and mortar store.

attribute-definition.display-name: When this attribute equals 'instore', the checkout flow will assign the shipping method (005) which has a no shipping charge.

attribute-definition.description: This is text used by the end user when sending a message to the brick and mortar store about the shipment. This is reflected in the order export.
Verify any addresses entered in Endless Aisle. Before enabling see Endless Aisle Implementation Guide for information on implementing AVS.
Comma-separated list of email addresses that will receive admin emails from the Support Dashboard
Allow gift messaging for shipping

Only used when Analytics Dispatch Type is set to "low_net_traffic". Amount of time in seconds that must pass without any requests being sent from the app before the analytics events will be sent. Allows the events to possibly be sent during a period of less traffic. Note that for Google Analytics you must set the Analytics Dispatch Interval to 0 in order to use manual event dispatching.

Interval in seconds that the events will be sent to the analytics service. Only used when Analytics Dispatch Type is set to "interval". Note: set to 0 if using Google Analytics and "low_net_traffic" is your Analytics Dispatch Type.

Specifies how you would like to dispatch analytics events. "interval" means that events will be sent at a regular interval as defined by the "dispatch_interval" property. "on_logout" means events will be sent when the associate logs out. "low_net_traffic" means that events will be sent only when there has been no network traffic for a predefined delay. This delay is set in the Analytics Event Dispatch Delay below.
Perform analytics tracking in Endless Aisle
Tracker ID for Google Analytics tracking in Endless Aisle
Attribute ID of type Boolean on Category to determine if it should be shown in category grid (home screen) and mega menu (if enabled)

Interval to check for payment device connected and updates the payment connection icon in the header. Set to Off to disable check and remove icon from header. When connection is lost the ‘No Connection to Payment Device’ dialog will appear as well as the icon updates.

Interval to check for payment device connected and displays dialog when not connected. Set to Off to disable check. ‘No Connection to Payment Device’ dialog will display every interval until connected.
The OCAPI client ID to use for Endless Aisle
Collect billing address for credit card authorization. Required for 'pay through web' checkout.
Attribute ID on Product to use for determining color variations
This is the endpoint to call for credit card authorization
This is the endpoint to call for decrypting credit cards

attribute-definition.display-name: Use Controllers for Decrypting Credit Card
attribute-definition.description: Whether to use controllers or pipelines to decrypt credit cards
Payment method for processing credit card in store purchases
Payment Processor for the processing in store purchases
Maximum number of customers to return in a search query
Alternative product DIS image size to be passed as a query string to the CDN

attribute-definition.display-name: DIS Product Alt Zoom Image Size {image_service.dynamic_size.altZoomImages}
attribute-definition.description: Product zoom DIS image size to be passed as a query string to the CDN
Bundled product DIS image size to be passed as a query string to the CDN
Cart DIS image size to be passed as a query string to the CDN
Category grid DIS image size to be passed as a query string to the CDN
Product detail main DIS image size to be passed as a query string to the CDN

attribute-definition.display-name: DIS Product Large Alt Zoom Image Size {image_service.dynamic_size.largeAltZoomImages}
attribute-definition.description: Product large alternative DIS image size to be passed as a query string to the CDN
Product set DIS image size to be passed as a query string to the CDN
Product grid DIS image size to be passed as a query string to the CDN
Base URL for DIS image service images. URL comes from the production instance. This must be set if DIS image service is used.

attribute-definition.display-name: Send Email to Endless Aisle Admin
attribute-definition.description: Send email to Endless Aisle Admin when error occurs in Endless Aisle Application
Exceptions that might happen from server requests (OCAPI or storefront) that should not trigger an error email
Send email for JavaScript errors that occur in Endless Aisle. To set for individual stores, do not set here; set on the Store system object.
Send email for errors that occur with OCAPI requests from Endless Aisle. To set for individual stores, do not set here; set on the Store system object.
Send email for errors that occur with storefront requests from Endless Aisle. To set for individual stores, do not set here; set on the Store system object..
Number of allowed failed login attempts
Display the Forgot Password link on the login dialog allowing the administrators to change associate passwords in Endless Aisle
Display the print order button on order details page from order history.
Display the email order button on order details page from order history.
Display the change Country link on the login dialog allowing the administrators to change the country in Endless Aisle
Allow gift cards during checkout. Not available for Adyen payment devices.
Alternative product image view type

attribute-definition.display-name: Product Alt Zoom Image View Type {image_service.view_type.altZoomImages}
attribute-definition.description: Product zoom image view type
Bundled product image view type
Cart image view type
Category grid image view type
Product detail main image view type

attribute-definition.display-name: Product Large Alt Zoom Image View Type {image_service.view_type.largeAltZoomImages}
attribute-definition.description: Product large alternative image view type
Image URL for placeholder image for missing images
Product grid ImageService view type
Product set image view type
Product swatch image view type. Shown in image zoom and variation selection.
Image service type to use for obtaining images displayed in Endless Aisle. When using DIS the view types most likely will all need to be updated to hi-res below, except for swatch.

Default for allowing image zoom on product images. For low wifi speeds it is recommended that image zoom is disabled depending on the size of your configured zoom image. This setting can be changed in Endless Aisle.
Display cart functionality while in kiosk mode. To set for individual stores, do not set here; set on the Store system object.
Amount of time in milliseconds to wait before resetting the kiosk after an order is completed. To set for individual stores, do not set here; set on the Store system object.
Password for the kiosk store associate. To set for individual stores, do not set here; set on the Store system object.

Username for the kiosk store associate used when kiosk mode is enabled in Endless Aisle. This user should be in the ki-mde permission group. If no username is specified then kiosk mode cannot be enabled in Endless Aisle. To set for individual stores, do not set here; set on the Store system object.

attribute-definition.display-name: Log Endless Aisle App Errors to Server
attribute-definition.description: Log Endless Aisle Application errors to server log when error occurs in Endless Aisle Application
Allow multi tender payments during checkout. Not available for Adyen payment devices or payment process flow 'A'.
Signature prompt will only occur when total amount is equal to or greater than configured amount. Set to 0 to always prompt. Set to -1 to never prompt. Not available for Adyen payment devices.
Amount of time before the OCAPI request will timeout
Maximum number of orders returned during order history lookups
A - Capture all Payment Instruments and Perform Auths in one final call like Site Genesis (not supported with multi tender payments), B - Perform Auths as payments are entered/captured
Country configuration which includes price book to use and display name and currency symbol for Business Manager Sales Reports.
Printer is available for receipts in Endless Aisle
Storefront URL to load for QR code printed on receipt

List of Product Override Reasons. New reasons need to be added to getsettings*.properties file in int_ocapi_ext in order to be localized. If you don't need localization you can enter the text you want to see in Endless Aisle.
Filter out unorderable variants

If enabled, Endless Aisle will filter out unorderable variation values. Enabling this will prevent store inventory (if enabled) to be shown for unorderable variation values. As an example, if this is enabled, colors that are unorderable will not show in Endless Aisle. If a size is not available for all colors then it will not show.
Allow product price overrides in Endless Aisle
Attribute ID of type Integer on Product to use for displaying ratings in Endless Aisle
Maximum value for product rating, which determines number of stars shown. If set to 0, the product rating will not show in Endless Aisle.
Display product recommendations in Endless Aisle
List of response error codes that will be used to retry GET server requests.
Number of times the Endless Aisle application will retry a GET server request when a network issue or timeout prevents a response. Only for those error codes specified in 'Server Retry Error Codes'.
Enable wish list in Endless Aisle
Display private wish lists when wish list is enabled in Endless Aisle
Display private items in wish lists and other product lists
Number of days before store password expires to notify associate to change password. If 0 then no notification will be displayed.
Color of bar charts in hex Eg: #7fbb00
IDs of the categories you would not like to display in the sales reports
Start of week can take value Monday or Sunday. If none, Monday is used by default
Show items sold chart for associate with associate level privileges
Show ranks chart for associate with associate level privileges
Show items sold chart for associate with store level privileges
Show ranks chart for associate with store level privileges
Page or pipelines to load for sales chart in webview (Do not change unless a new page/pipeline will be used)

attribute-definition.display-name: Items Sold Chart URL Page Name {sales_reports.url_page_names.items_sold}
attribute-definition.description: Page or pipelines to load for items sold chart in webview (Do not change unless a new page/pipeline will be used)

attribute-definition.display-name: Associates Ranking Chart URL Page Name {sales_reports.url_page_names.ranks.associates}
attribute-definition.description: Page or pipelines to load for associates ranking chart in webview (Do not change unless a new page/pipeline will be used)

attribute-definition.display-name: Stores Ranking Chart URL Page Name {sales_reports.url_page_names.ranks.stores}
attribute-definition.description: Page or pipelines to load for stores ranking chart in webview (Do not change unless a new page/pipeline will be used)
Number of page reload tries when main webview (sales) fails to load
Default radius for searching stores for product inventory. This setting can be changed in Endless Aisle.
Amount of time between pings to the server in order to keep the session alive

Default amount of time before the associate is logged out of Endless Aisle when there is no activity in the app. This setting can be overridden at the store level and in Endless Aisle. To set for individual stores, do not set here; set on the Store system object.
Amount of time the associate has to continue the session before logout occurs

attribute-definition.display-name: Ship to Store Free Shipping Methods {ship_to_store.free_shipping_ids}
attribute-definition.description: When shipping to this store, indicate which shipping method ids should provide free shipping.

List of Shipping Override Reasons. New reasons need to be added to getsettings*.properties file in int_ocapi_ext in order to be localized. If you don't need localization you can enter the text you want to see in Endless Aisle.
Allow shipping price overrides in Endless Aisle
Folder path to save the customer signature for the payment authorization
Attribute ID on Product to use for determining if variation is size to display size chart link
Attribute ID on Category to use for displaying size chart in Endless Aisle. The attribute specified contains the ID of the content asset that contains sizing information.
Attribute ID on Category to use for obtaining CSS file for styling of size chart in Endless Aisle
Display store inventory in Endless Aisle. Requires setup of inventory per store and will show Inventory tab on Product Details.
Default unit type for searching inventory of product in stores. This setting can be changed in Endless Aisle.
Amount of time before the storefront request will timeout
Signature prompt will only occur when total amount is equal to or greater than configured amount. Set to 0 to always prompt. Set to -1 to never prompt. Not available for Adyen payment devices.
For Adyen payment devices, associate is required to confirm signature from customer prior to approval.
Endless Aisle will check for a connection to the payment terminal during the checkout process if enabled. If no connection then ‘No Connection to Payment Device’ dialog will appear.

Endless Aisle will check for a connection to the payment terminal right after login if true and if no connection, then ‘No Connection to Payment Device’ dialog will appear. If this is set to disabled, but either Check Device Interval configurations below are set then you will see 'No Connection to Payment Device' at login if no device connected.

attribute-definition.display-name: Google Places API Web Service Key {google_places_key}
attribute-definition.description: The key generated in Google developer API console to consume Google API's for address suggestions
The radius in meters for Google address suggestions. Maximum 50,000 meters.
Show address suggestions from Google while filling out address forms
Enable option for order to be shipped and picked up from the store it was placed

attribute-definition.display-name: Pick Entire Order From Another Store {alternate_shipping_options.order_pickup_different_store}
attribute-definition.description: Enable the option for an entire order to be shipped and picked up from a different store
Indicate which shipping method ids reflect store pickup.
Send email for JavaScript errors that occur in Endless Aisle for this store
Send email for errors that occur with OCAPI requests from Endless Aisle for this store
Send email for errors that occur with storefront requests from Endless Aisle for this store
Display cart functionality while in kiosk mode for this store
Amount of time in milliseconds to wait before resetting the kiosk after an order is completed
Password for the kiosk store associate for this store
Username for the kiosk store associate used when kiosk mode is enabled in Endless Aisle for this store. This user should be in the ki-mde permission group.
Default amount of time before the associate is logged out of Endless Aisle for this store when there is no activity in the app. This setting can be overridden in Endless Aisle.
